name: 灯織
trans: Mano.

name: 真乃
text:
あ、灯織ちゃんっ
お疲れさま
trans:
Ah, Hiori-chan!
Good morning.

name: 真乃
trans: Hup...

name: 灯織
trans: I should get one too.

name: 真乃
text: ……灯織ちゃんも、ミルクティーだ
trans: ... Hiori-chan, you're getting milk tea too.

name: 灯織
trans: Yeah...

name: 灯織
text: 真乃、それ、ちゃんとあったかいやつ？
trans: Mano, you sure that one's the warm kind?

name: 真乃
trans: Ehehe, thanks for asking.

name: 真乃
trans: I got the right one this time!

name: めぐる
trans: Mano! Hioriii!

name: めぐる
trans: ... Diiiive!

name: 灯織
trans: Geez... Meguru!

name: 真乃
text: ふふっ、めぐるちゃんっ
trans: Heehee, Meguru-chan!

name: めぐる
text: あー！　ふたりだけ何か飲もうとしてる！
trans: Ahh! You're sneaking some drinks for yourselves!

name: めぐる
text:
ずるいんだー！
わたしも欲しいよー
trans:
That's no fair!
I want one too!

name: めぐる
trans: Let's see...

name: 灯織
trans: ... Meguru, milk tea for you too?

name: めぐる
text: えへへっ、だってふたりとも持ってるんだもん！
trans: Eheheh, 'cause I want to match you two!

name: めぐる
trans: ──Wah, it's hot!

name: 真乃
text: ふふっ、めぐるちゃん手袋してないから……
trans:
Heehee, 'cause you're not wearing any gloves,
Meguru-chan...

name: 灯織
trans: Should we walk a little until it cools down?

name: めぐる
text: えっ、いいの？　じゃあ、河原の方から回っていこうよ！
trans:
Huh, can we? Then, let's walk around 
from the riverbank!

name: 真乃
trans: Sure!

name: めぐる
text: うわぁ、なんだかいつもより水が多いねー
trans: Wow, it's like there's more water than usual...

name: 灯織
text: 時期的に、雪解け水かな
trans: Since it's this time of the year, I guess it's snowmelt.

name: めぐる
text:
これ、雪だった水なんだ……！
冷たそうー！
trans:
So this water used to be snow...!
It looks so cold!

name: 真乃
trans: Ah, green-winged teals...!

name: 真乃
text:
あの、あそこ……
群れで飛んでる鳥さんたち……
trans:
Umm, over there... 
Those birds flying in a flock...

name: めぐる
text:
わーっ！　いっぱいいる！
コガモっていうんだ
trans:
Wooow! There are lots of them!
So they're called green-winged teals.

name: 真乃
trans: Yeah...

name: 真乃
text:
コガモさんたち、
きっと北の方へ帰る練習をしてるの
trans:
Those teals, they must be practicing
for their flight back to the north.

name: 灯織
trans: I see, because they're migratory birds.

name: 真乃
text:
若いコガモさんは、春までいっぱい練習してきて
これから本番なんだ
trans:
The little teals practice a lot before spring
and they're about to make their real trip soon.

name: めぐる
text: あっ、北海道とかまで行くんでしょ！？
trans: Ah, they're going all the way up to Hokkaido, right!?

name: 灯織
text:
もっと遠くまで行く鳥もいるって、聞いたことある
たぶん、シベリアとか……
trans:
I've heard that some birds go even further north.
Maybe, to Siberia or further...

name: 真乃
text:
うん。時々お休みしながら、
ずっとずっと、飛んでいくの
trans:
Yeah. They take some breaks in between,
but they keep flying, on and on.

name: めぐる
trans: To Siberia...!

name: めぐる
text: …………そ、それじゃ、すっごく頑張らなきゃね……！
trans: ... T-Then, they've really got to work hard, huh...!

name: 灯織
text:
……あっ、あの子
ちょっと遅れてる……！
trans:
... Ah, that one
looks like it's falling behind...!

name: めぐる
text:
わっ、ほんとだ……！
……落ちちゃいそうじゃない！？
trans:
Waah, you're right...!
... Doesn't it look like it's going to fall!?

name: 真乃
text:
まだ、あんまり慣れてないみたい……
──頑張って……！
trans:
Looks like, it's not quite used to it yet... 
──Hang in there...!

name: 灯織
trans:
.... Yeah
Hang in there...!

name: めぐる
trans: Keep going, keep going!

name: 真乃
trans: ... Howaaa...

name: めぐる
trans: Wow! It did it!

name: 灯織
text: よかった……持ち直したみたい！
trans: That's great... looks like it managed to recover!

name: めぐる
text:
うんっ！　ちゃんと飛んでるよ！
みんなと一緒に！
trans:
Yeah! It's flying steady now!
All together with the rest of them!

name: 灯織
trans: Yeah...

name: 真乃
trans: ... Yeah!

name: めぐる
text: コガモさーん！　頑張ってーっ！
trans: Hey, little teals! Do your beeest!

name: めぐる
text: きっと、もっと飛べるようになるよーっ！
trans: You'll definitely, fly even further, from now oooon!

name: 真乃
trans: ... Spring is coming, isn't it.

name: 灯織
trans: ... Mano?

name: 灯織
trans: ... Yeah, spring is coming.

name: 真乃
text:
……ふふっ
灯織ちゃん、めぐるちゃん
trans:
... Heehee.
Hiori-chan, Meguru-chan.

name: 真乃
text:
あの……
隣にいてくれて、ありがとう
trans:
Umm... 
Thank you, for being by my side.

name: 灯織
trans: ... Mano.

name: めぐる
trans: Mano...!

name: めぐる
trans: I should say the same to you!

name: 灯織
trans: Yeah. Me too.

name: 真乃
trans: ... Yeah.

name: 真乃
text: 私も、ふたりの隣で、頑張るね
trans: I'll do my best, beside you two, too.

name: 真乃
trans: So that yesterday, can be for today...

name: 真乃
text: この日のためだったって、思えるように
trans: So we'll believe, that yesterday is for this day's sake.
